title: Introducing: Stevie Talks
body:
These two new tracks from **Stevie Talks** really mark a significant progression for the Cali based artist, especially the Tobias Jesso Jr.

\-esque Bitter. Almost Americana tinged songwriting, Bitter is emotionally vulnerable whilst maintaining a real humanity, whereas the more upbeat Georgia feels inspired by the likes of Kurt Vile and Foxygen. Check out both below.

excerpt.full: These two new tracks from Stevie Talks really mark a significant progression for the Cali based artist, especially the Tobias Jesso Jr.-esque Bitter. Almost Americana tinged songwriting, Bitter is emotionally vulnerable whilst maintaining a real humanity, whereas the more upbeat Georgia feels inspired by the likes of Kurt Vile and Foxygen. Check out both below.
